translation.en: Ready to forget once and for all.
Now feel yourselves getting sleepier and sleepier.
translation.es: Ahora, empiecen a sentir más y más sueño.

translation.en: Neither of you will remember the last year.
translation.es: Ninguno de los dos recordará el último año.

translation.en: There is no place called The Further.
translation.es: No existe un lugar llamado: El Más Allá.

translation.en: You will only remember Dalton's coma.
translation.es: Solo recordarán que Dalton estuvo en coma.

translation.en: And let the darkness drift further...
translation.es: Y dejen que la oscuridad se aleje...

translation.en: For everything, there is a season.
and a time to throw away.
A time to mourn, and a time to dance.
translation.es: Un tiempo para el luto y un tiempo para bailar.

translation.en: A time for war, and a time for peace.
translation.es: Un tiempo para la guerra y un tiempo para la paz.

translation.en: We therefore commit this body to the ground.
translation.es: Entregamos este cuerpo a la tierra.

translation.en: Earth to earth, ashes to ashes,
translation.es: Tierra a tierra, cenizas a cenizas...

translation.en: It was a beautiful service for a beautiful grandma.
translation.es: Fue una misa hermosa para una abuela hermosa.

translation.en: She loved you guys so much.
Your mother was a fine friend, Josh. Thank you.
translation.es: - Tu madre fue una gran amiga, Josh. - Gracias.

translation.en: I know she misses you too, Kali.
Okay, that's not true, and she does miss you.
translation.es: Oye, eso no es cierto. Sí te extraña.

translation.en: See you guys next weekend, okay?
translation.es: Los veo el fin de semana.

translation.en: - See what I mean? - He's just anxious about leaving.
translation.es: ¿Ya ves? Es ansiedad porque ya se va.
A la escuela. La próxima semana.

translation.en: Thank you for organizing all this. I just haven't had the bandwidth.
translation.es: Gracias por organizar esto. No tengo cabeza para nada.

translation.en: Why don't you drive him to school?
translation.es: ¿Y si lo llevas a la escuela?

translation.en: You have a few weeks until all your students show up.
translation.es: Tus alumnos no llegarán en semanas.

translation.en: - Nah, he wouldn't want me to. - He's not the parent, you are.
translation.es: - No, no va a querer. - Él no es el padre, eres tú.

translation.en: If you don't want to, that's a different story.
translation.es: Si no quieres, - ya es otra cosa. - No puedo.
- ya es otra cosa. - No puedo.

translation.en: Maybe some way that you guys could connect, that's all.
translation.es: A ver si así se reconectaban, nada más.

translation.en: He's gonna be gone soon, so...
translation.es: Se va a ir pronto, así que...

translation.en: Appreciate you coming. I'm sorry I grabbed you.
- I got a lot on my mind. - I'm sure.
translation.es: - Tengo mucho en la mente. - Claro.

translation.en: Death floods the mind with memory.
translation.es: La mente inunda la mente con recuerdos.

translation.en: But there's always new ones to make, right?
translation.es: Pero siempre hay que crear nuevos, ¿no?

translation.en: What did you just tell me? Well, just tell me, Dalton.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me lo dices? Dímelo, Dalton.

translation.en: Do you wanna clean-- ? Do you wanna keep the same diaper on?
We can just clean out the diaper and then put the same diaper back on.
translation.es: Hagamos algo. Podemos lavar ese pañal... y te lo vuelvo a poner.

translation.en: - - You like that? Okay, I'll do that, then.
translation.es: Te parece bien. Bueno, hagamos eso.

translation.en: What kind of outfit do you want?
- Oop. What kind of outfit do you want? -
All you got to do is talk to me.
Come on. It's the greatest guy in the world.
translation.es: Habla. DALTON: SI QUIERES Es el mejor del mundo.

translation.en: You're gonna have to pull out of your little funk
or it's gonna be a long few days.
translation.es: o serán unos días muy largos.

translation.en: ♪ But if you're tired Of the same old story ♪
♪ I'll be here when you are ready... ♪
Mom said you got that art teacher you wanted. What's his name?
translation.es: Tu mamá dijo que te dieron al maestro de arte que querías.

translation.en: I mean, she better be, with what we're paying.
translation.es: Más vale, para lo que pagaremos.

translation.en: ♪ Those lives were mine To love and cherish ♪
translation.es: DANOS VUESTRA LUZ Y VUESTRA VERDAD

translation.en: ♪ To guard and guide along life's way ♪
All right. Let the fun begin.
Kappa Tau, huh? I was, uh, Kappa Z.
translation.es: Kappa Tau, ¿eh? Yo fui Kappa Z.

translation.en: I'll take one for him. Just put it... Thank you.
translation.es: Yo se lo llevo. Ponlo... Gracias.

translation.en: Oh, all right. You get first dibs.
translation.es: Ah, qué bien. Te toca escoger.

translation.en: Why don't you pick a bed?
Mom got you this, uh, power station thing.
translation.es: Mamá te empacó la fuente de poder.

translation.en: What do you got here? You got, uh, two outlets...
USB port, and, uh, two jumper cables, which are useless.
translation.es: ¿Qué tiene? Dos enchufes, puerto USB... y cables para pasar corriente. Que no sirven para nada.

translation.en: Guess Mom put it in there.
This is intense. This what you been working on?
translation.es: Qué intenso. ¿Es lo que has estado dibujando?

translation.en: - Put it back. - No, it's really good.
translation.es: - Déjalo ahí. - No, es muy bueno.

translation.en: Did you do this from memory?
It's from a photo I found at the house.
translation.es: Es de una foto que hallé en la casa.

translation.en: Felt like. The last few years.
She had a tough go, you know, being a single mom.
translation.es: Tuvo una vida difícil, siendo madre soltera.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, that's... Yeah, that's tough.
Guess I didn't make the wall, huh?
translation.es: ¿No me tocó estar en la pared?

translation.en: You know, I'm sorry I haven't been around lately.
Of course, my dad wasn't around at all, but...
translation.es: Claro que mi padre nunca estuvo, pero...

translation.en: So, it could be a lot worse.
I've just been a little foggy past few years.
translation.es: Solo me he sentido... confundido los últimos años. Como si el cerebro...

translation.en: I don't know, my brain just...
translation.es: confundido los últimos años. Como si el cerebro...

translation.en: haven't been able to manage a time
for, uh, you and your brother and sister.
translation.es: el suficiente tiempo... para ti y tus hermanos.

translation.en: Have you ever thought about getting help?
I'm just trying to push through.
- Are you Dalton Lambert? - Yeah. Are you...?
- Everything cool, fellas? - Yeah, no, everything's fine.
translation.es: - ¿Todo está bien? - Sí, no, todo bien,

translation.en: I just-- I thought my roommate would be a, um...
translation.es: pero creí que mi compañero era...

translation.en: I just figured it's a liberal arts school, and we mean liberal.
translation.es: Es una escuela liberal de arte, énfasis en liberal.

translation.en: Yeah, probably just confused by the name Chris.
translation.es: Sí, me confundió el nombre de Chris.

translation.en: Right. 'Cause that would never happen with a name like Dalton.
translation.es: Claro. Eso nunca pasaría con un nombre como Dalton.

translation.en: You know, I'm gonna go down to the housing office
translation.es: Iré a la oficina de dormitorios...

translation.en: and get this all sorted out.
No, no, no. Please, father of Dalton. Allow me.
translation.es: No, no. Por favor, padre de Dalton, permítame. Interrumpí su convivencia masculina.

translation.en: I clearly interrupted some boy bonding.
If you hate it, no worries. But you're not gonna hate it.
translation.es: Si lo odias, no pasa nada. Pero no lo vas a odiar.

translation.en: You really don't know me, do you? I mean, you really think I wanna join a frat?
translation.es: ¿Me conoces? ¿Crees que me interesa una fraternidad?

translation.en: I mean, do it for me. I drove you here.
translation.es: Hazlo por mí. Te traje hasta aquí.

translation.en: - You didn't even want to. - Of course I did.
I heard what Mom said at the funeral.
translation.es: Escuché a mamá en el funeral.

translation.en: Oh, so that makes you father of the year now?
translation.es: Ah, ¿ahora eres el padre del año?

translation.en: At least you've got a father.
Stop blaming your dad for shit you screwed up.
translation.es: No culpes a tu padre por tus errores.

translation.en: He left like 40 years ago. Get over it. God knows I'm not gonna be defined by you.
translation.es: Te dejó hace como 40 años, supéralo ya. Yo no voy a ser como tú.

translation.en: Are you kidding me? After all we have done for you?
translation.es: ¿Es en serio? ¿Después de todo lo que hemos hecho por ti?

translation.en: When did you become this ungrateful, little shit?
You can tell it's Shania Twain, right?
So, what'd they say at housing?  They said, Tough titties.
translation.es: - ¿Qué dijeron del dormitorio? - Dijeron que qué lástima.

translation.en: I got to sleep here tonight.
But I'll get a new room tomorrow, so it's not a permanent thing.
translation.es: Pero mañana me asignan otro, no es permanente.

translation.en: - You're in the art school, I take it? - Yeah. Are you music?
but the artist's life is one of nomadic instability
translation.es: pero la vida del artista es inestable...

translation.en: But I'm sure you'll be super successful.
translation.es: Pero a ti te va a ir superbien.

translation.en: - You wanna blow my hooter? - What?
- Uh, just a little piano. - It's the same thing. Just blow.
translation.es: Un poco de piano. Es lo mismo. Pero sopla.

translation.en: It's just something my mom wrote.
what's some weird shit about you?
On Sundays, I wear a monocle and I order takeout with a British accent.
translation.es: Los domingos uso monóculo y pido comida con acento británico.

translation.en: Okay, sometimes I eat instant oatmeal,
translation.es: Bueno, a veces como... avena instantánea...

translation.en: uh, with no, like, water or milk or anything.
translation.es: pero sin agua ni leche ni nada.

translation.en: When I was 10, my parents died, and I went to go live with my Grandma Perkee,
translation.es: A los 10 años, mis padres murieron y me fui con mi abuela Perkee,

translation.en: who once went almost nearly blind from a gnarly case of athlete's foot.
translation.es: quien casi se quedó ciega por un grave caso de pie de atleta.

translation.en: I don't remember when I was 10.
At least that's what they told me, the few times that they would talk about it.
translation.es: Al menos eso me dijeron las pocas veces que hablaron de eso.

translation.en: I don't even remember being sick.
It's like I woke up one day and a whole year had passed.
translation.es: Fue como despertar un día y todo un año había pasado.

translation.en: Yeah, honestly, I wish I could have forgotten a whole year when I was a kid.
translation.es: También quisiera haber olvidado todo un año cuando era niña.

translation.en: Could've used a little meningi- gi.
Uh... you know, there is one more weird thing about me.
Um, ever since my coma, I've been afraid of the dark.
translation.es: Desde que estuve en coma... le tengo miedo a la oscuridad.

translation.en: I was afraid of Barbie dolls till I was, like... now.
translation.es: Yo le tuve miedo a las Barbies hasta... hoy.

translation.en: There's nothing wrong with being scared.
Just as long as you don't keep me up with some bright- ass night light.
translation.es: Mientras no pongas una luz que no me deje dormir.

translation.en: I can't get to the phone right now, so leave me a message and I'll give you a call back.
translation.es: No puedo responder. Deja un mensaje y te llamo.

translation.en: Just making sure you're getting settled in okay.
translation.es: Solo para ver si ya te instalaste.

translation.en: I was just, uh, thinking about what you said...
translation.es: Me quedé pensando en lo que dijiste...

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know what's going on with me, but, um...
translation.es: no sé. No sé... qué me pasa, pero...

translation.en: And I just wanted you to know that.
Pull out something that will interest me.
- It looks like a photograph. - Thanks.
I worked my ass off on this piece.
Usually, I go through introductions before someone quits.
translation.es: Normalmente renuncian después de las presentaciones.

translation.en: - I didn't quit. - Yes, you did.
You just haven't realized it yet. You can go.
translation.es: Pero aún no te das cuenta. Puedes irte.
Cualquier tonto puede aprender una técnica...

translation.en: It doesn't mean anything if it doesn't come from inside.
translation.es: Pero no sirve de nada si no viene del interior.

translation.en: I am not interested in the rules of art.
translation.es: A mí no me interesan las reglas del arte.

translation.en: We are going to break the rules.
Then I want you to break them again.
translation.es: Y luego, quiero que las vuelvan a romper.

translation.en: See how broken you can get.
Why in the hell would you destroy a beautiful drawing like that?
translation.es: ¿Por qué carajo destruiste un hermoso dibujo como ese?

translation.en: Good. You must let go of your past.
translation.es: Bien. Tienen que dejar su pasado.

translation.en: Shed your skin in order to grow.

translation.es: Con cada número, quiero que se hundan...

translation.en: I want you to sink further and further into yourself.
translation.es: Con cada número, quiero que se hundan... más y más en ustedes mismos.

translation.en: Do not lift the charcoal from the paper.
translation.es: No despeguen el carboncillo del papel.

translation.en: Draw whatever your soul brings forth.
translation.es: Dibujen lo que les mande su alma.

translation.en: You've got to be willing to dredge up

translation.es: en sus pensamientos más profundos y feos.

translation.en: Is it keeping you in or out?
The machine is quite loud, but you'll be able to hear me.
translation.es: La máquina es ruidosa, pero podrá escucharme.

translation.en: I'm going to need you to stay as still as possible throughout the procedure.
translation.es: Necesito que se quede tan quieto como pueda hasta el final.

translation.en: If you feel like you need to get out of there,
translation.es: Si siente que necesita salir de ahí...

translation.en: give the call ball a squeeze, we'll give you a break.
Yep. Let's just get this over with.
Dr. Brower, what did you say?
Okay, can you let me out, please?
- - Hello, hey! Can you let me out?
Okay, okay. Let me out. Let me out. Hey! Dr. Brower.
Come on. Get me out of here.
Just let me out. Let me out, let me out, let me out.
- What was that? - Are you okay?
- Who was that? Why did the lights go out? - Calm down.
You said the lights went out?
All the lights went out and I got stuck in there, man.
translation.es: Todas las luces y me quedé atrapado ahí.

translation.en: You went right out. Your MRI went perfectly.
translation.es: Completamente. Su resonancia salió a la perfección.

translation.en: - What? - Take your time to get dressed.
There's nothing physically wrong with you. No growths or spots on the brain.
translation.es: Físicamente, no tiene nada malo. No hay manchas en el cerebro.

translation.en: Yeah, no, I know, I, uh...
I guess I was just hoping for something real.
Something that could explain this fog.
The memory issues you're talking about, they could be spurred on by a number of things.
translation.es: Su problema de memoria puede deberse a muchas cosas.

translation.en: Increased stress, change in daily habits.
translation.es: Aumento de estrés, cambios de costumbres.

translation.en: Have there been any disruptions in your home life?
translation.es: ¿Ha habido cambios en su vida doméstica?

translation.en: My, uh, mom passed away recently.
Not to mention my son left for school,
translation.es: Además de que mi hijo se fue a la universidad...

translation.en: and, uh, my ex- wife hardly talks to me, so...
translation.es: Además de que mi hijo se fue a la universidad... y mi exesposa apenas me habla.

translation.en: Maybe a grief counselor be of some help?
translation.es: Tal vez un tanatólogo podría ayudarle.

translation.en: Do you have any history of mental illness in your family?
translation.es: ¿Hay casos de enfermedades mentales en su familia?

translation.en: It's nothing to be alarmed about.
It can be informative as we try to make a diagnosis.
translation.es: Puede ser útil para el diagnóstico.

translation.en: Meanwhile, there are exercises, games you can do to stimulate your memory.
translation.es: Mientras, hay ejercicios, juegos para estimular la memoria.
El juego de mesa de Memoria.

translation.en: You want me to play kids' games?
We can learn a lot from kids.
Got my new room assignment today.
So, alas, no more panty parties.

translation.es: Pero no llores, estaré en la 323.

translation.en: So, be cautious, young man, lest I hear you slap your sausage in the dead of night.
translation.es: No hagas ruido, no quiero oír si te tocas la salchicha en la noche.

translation.en: - You want to join a frat? - What?
No, it's just something my dad got me.
translation.es: No, mi padre me trajo eso.

translation.en: We can make fun of their khaki pants and trust funds.
translation.es: A burlarnos de su ropa y del dinero de sus papis.

translation.en: Come on, Dolphin. Do something nice for your old man.
translation.es: Anda, Daltónico, dale gusto a tu padre.

translation.en: What's the worst that could happen?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo peor que puede pasar?

translation.en: May I offer you some diaper pudding?
Oh, come on. Quit your bitching and come here.
translation.es: Por favor, deja de chillar y ven acá.

translation.en: To memorialize the night that Dalton Lambert actually has fun!
translation.es: Inmortalicemos la noche en que Dalton Lambert se divirtió.

translation.en: Nick the Dick! Nick the Dick! Nick the Dick!
translation.es: ¡El Nefasto Nick! ¡El Nefasto Nick! ¡El Nefasto Nick!

translation.en: Welcome to the Kappa House, and welcome back to school, baby.
translation.es: Bienvenidos a la casa Kappa y feliz regreso a clases.

translation.en: I'm just here to remind you fine folks that frats,
translation.es: Solo quiero recordarles que las fraternidades...

translation.en: Right, and we must protect our right to party
translation.es: Y debemos proteger nuestro derecho a hacer fiestas...

translation.en: White, Black, brown, or blue, you're all welcome at JPU,
translation.es: Blancos, negros, morenos o azules, todos son bienvenidos aquí...

translation.en: that the frat house is the last house
translation.es: que la fraternidad es la última casa donde...

translation.en: where men can still be men.
Now, we got a lot of drinking to do tonight,
translation.es: Ahora, hay mucho por beber esta noche,

translation.en: We do not need another incident.
- Hey, rest in peace! - This party's lame.
Confirmed. So, let's go upstairs and look through everyone's shit.
translation.es: Confirmo. Subamos a hurgar las cosas de todos.

translation.en: And this is Nick's butthole cream.
translation.es: Y la crema anal de Nick.

translation.en: I'm going to go spread this on the communal crapper. BRB.
translation.es: Voy a embarrarla en el baño. Ahora vengo.

translation.en: Make it stop. - Make it stop. -
translation.es: Haz que se detenga. Haz que se detenga.

translation.en: I'll be right back. I just need some supplies.
♪ Tonight is your night, bro Tonight is the night ♪
translation.es: Esta es tu noche Esta es tu noche

translation.en: A dance would be nice. We can dance.
I think I just saw something...
- Now. - But this is just getting fun.
- Is somebody in my room? - Shit, shit, shit.
translation.es: - ¿Hay alguien en mi cuarto? - Carajo, carajo.

translation.en: One of you peckerwoods is about to get the hammer drop.
translation.es: Les va a ir mal, estúpidos de mierda.

translation.en: We were just looking for some privacy, you know?
translation.es: Solo queríamos privacidad, ¿entiendes? Lo íbamos a hacer.

translation.en: I'd rather watch my parents do it.
translation.es: Preferiría ver a mis padres hacerlo.

translation.en: We might get drunk enough to find you attractive.
translation.es: Con suficiente alcohol, podríamos verte linda.

translation.en: Even though you look like a clown.
I'm more partial to kick the dick.
That was pretty quick thinking back there, right?
I should've asked before I kissed you, right?
I am sorry. I was just... I was going on instinct.
I'm fine. It's just, I, um...
I'm just sorry for what he said to you.
translation.es: Me siento mal por lo que te dijo.

translation.en: You think I care what Vineyard Vines thinks? He should be so lucky.
translation.es: ¿Crees que me importa su opinión? Ya quisiera.

translation.en: Hey, buddy, it is, uh, me again.
Um, I went to the doctor.
Well, not okay. But I'm getting to the bottom of it.
translation.es: Bueno, no tan bien. Pero lo estoy resolviendo.

translation.en: So, uh, just give me a call when you can.
I'm really sorry, Dalton, about what I said the other day.
translation.es: Perdón, Dalton, por lo que dije el otro día.

translation.en: Please don't tell me you're really just a creep.
translation.es: No me digas que eres un fisgón.

translation.en: Then what the hell is going on?
Something's happening to me. I'm seeing things, crazy things.
translation.es: Me está pasando algo. Veo cosas, cosas muy locas.

translation.en: You know that kid at the frat house that they talked about, with the incident?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas el chico de la fraternidad que tuvo un incidente?

translation.en: - Uh- huh. - I saw him. And he was dead.
translation.es: Yo lo vi. Y estaba muerto.

translation.en: It started with an art exercise,
translation.es: Empezó por un ejercicio de arte.

translation.en: and she asked us to dig deep into a memory, into our subconscious.
translation.es: La maestra dijo que buscáramos un recuerdo en nuestro inconsciente.

translation.en: So, I did and I drew this door.
You really need to lay off the frat juice.
Tonight, I was painting and I fell asleep.
translation.es: Hoy estaba pintando y me quedé dormido.

translation.en: And when I woke up, this lantern appeared.
translation.es: Y cuando desperté, se apareció una lámpara.

translation.en: It was like a dream, but it wasn't a dream.
translation.es: Parecía un sueño, pero no era un sueño.

translation.en: And then I walked to your room.
I feel like I'm getting closer to something.
translation.es: Siento que me estoy acercando a algo.

translation.en: Or something's getting closer to me.
translation.es: O algo se está acercando a mí.

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know.
translation.es: Yo no sé. Yo no sé.

translation.en: The dance of light and shadow.
translation.es: La danza de la luz y las sombras.

translation.en: An effect used not only to create volume and definition,
translation.es: Un efecto que no solo se usa para crear volumen y definición,

translation.en: but also a specific, unseen light source.
translation.es: sino para crear una fuente de luz específica fuera del cuadro.

translation.en: Right. This is one of Goya's best.
translation.es: Bien. Esta es una de las mejores de Goya.

translation.en: The negative space draws our eyes towards Saturn.
translation.es: El espacio negativo lleva la vista hacia Saturno.

translation.en: - Does it represent darkness or some void? -
Goya mastered it on the canvas,
translation.es: Goya lo dominó en el lienzo,

translation.en: but family problems and health issues sent this once- revered court painter
translation.es: pero los problemas familiares y de salud llevaron al célebre pintor...

translation.en: leading him to create this grisly portrait
translation.es: Y así creó un retrato horripilante...

translation.en: of a father devouring his son.
translation.es: de un padre devorando a su hijo.

translation.en: This balance between light and dark is what we're after.
translation.es: El equilibrio entre luz y oscuridad es lo que buscamos.

translation.en: Your own experiences shape your artwork. Embrace them. Use them.
translation.es: Sus experiencias modelan su trabajo. Acéptenlas. Úsenlas.

translation.en: Sink deep into the darkness of memory.
translation.es: Sumérjanse en la oscuridad de la memoria.

translation.en: Come on, man. Doesn't that mean anything to you? A red door?
translation.es: No, en serio. ¿No te dice nada? Una puerta roja.
Suenas más raro que de costumbre.

translation.en: It's a thing from art class. It's a painting.
translation.es: Es para la clase de arte. Es una pintura.

translation.en: We had to find a memory.
I thought it was something from our childhood. Did you ask Mom?
translation.es: - Creí que era de nuestra infancia. - ¿Le preguntaste a mamá?

translation.en: No, I don't want to worry her.
translation.es: No, no quiero que se preocupe.

translation.en: - I don't know. - This what happens when you go to college?
translation.es: - No sé. - ¿Eso te pasa en la universidad?

translation.en: You get all cryptic and shit?
So, after the whole spooky dream- not- a- dream thing the other night,
translation.es: Después de la otra noche y tu sueño- que- no- era- un- sueño,

translation.en: Yeah, okay, Dalton's a weirdo, but he's not insane, right?
translation.es: Sí, Dalton es un raro, pero no está loco, ¿o sí?.

translation.en: I'm gonna need that key back.
Right. So, I started poking around the old interwebs...
translation.es: Y bueno, me puse a buscar en la red...

translation.en: Looks like they filmed it in between shifts at Best Buy.
translation.es: Parece que lo filmaron en el supermercado.

translation.en: Hey, guys, this is Spectral Sightings. I'm Specs, this is Tucker. Say hi, Tucker.
translation.es: Esto es Avistamientos Espectrales. Soy Specs y él es Tucker. Saluda.

translation.en: We're gonna talk about something that dozens of you
translation.es: Hoy hablaremos de algo que muchos...

translation.en: It's a real phenomenon. Our physical body falls asleep
translation.es: Es un fenómeno real. Nuestro cuerpo físico se duerme...

translation.en: and our astral body leaves that physical body...
translation.es: y nuestro cuerpo astral deja el físico...

translation.en: and floats off into another realm.
- That's exactly what it feels like. - See, I told you. It's cool, right?
translation.es: - Eso es justo lo que siento. - Te lo dije. Cool ¿no?

translation.en: Our former mentor, Dr. Elise Rainier,
translation.es: Nuestra mentora, la Dra. Elise Rainier...

translation.en: she had a name for this other realm.
translation.es: tenía un nombre para ese otro reino.

translation.en: - She called it The Further. - Hold on.
translation.es: - Lo llamaba El Más Allá. - Espera.

translation.en: It's nice to see you all.
So, I'm here to talk to you about astral projection...
translation.es: Y vengo a hablarles del viaje astral...

translation.en: filled with tortured souls of the dead...
translation.es: lleno de las almas torturadas de los muertos...

translation.en: to live the worst mistakes of their lives
translation.es: a revivir los peores errores de su vida...

translation.en: over and over and over for all eternity.
translation.es: una y otra vez por toda la eternidad.

translation.en: or you travel to this realm...
that you awaken with your presence.
Life is what they crave more than anything.
translation.es: La vida es lo que anhelan... más que nada.
más riesgoso se vuelve el viaje.

translation.en: They want life, and they can come to our world to get it.
translation.es: Desean vida y pueden venir a nuestro mundo a conseguirla.

translation.en: I see those gears turning. What is it?
- That kid from the frat house? - The pukey kid?
translation.es: El chico de la fraternidad. ¿El vomitador?

translation.en: Yeah. He said something to me.
I'm sure he did. It probably wasn't his proudest moment.
translation.es: Claro. De seguro le dio vergüenza.

translation.en: Yeah, but what if he meant something else?
translation.es: Sí, pero... ¿Y si se refería a otra cosa?

translation.en: What if he was talking about this door?
So, what? You want to go back and ask him?
Look, I feel bad for the dude, I do,
translation.es: Oye, me siento mal por él, lo juro...

translation.en: but dark realms are typically places I try to avoid.
translation.es: pero prefiero evitar los reinos oscuros.

translation.en: It's not like Nick the Dick is just gonna let you waltz into his bedroom
translation.es: El Nefasto Nick no te dejará entrar... a su cuarto a hablar con el fantasma del baño.

translation.en: and chat with the ghost in his toilet.
translation.es: a su cuarto a hablar con el fantasma del baño.

translation.en: - I got this. - Can I help you?

translation.es: Hola. Se me olvidó mi brassiere...

translation.en: I have left my brassiere in Nicholas's room,
translation.es: Hola. Se me olvidó mi brassiere... en el cuarto de Nick y quería ver si se encuentra en casa.

translation.en: and I was wondering if he is perchance home?
translation.es: en el cuarto de Nick y quería ver si se encuentra en casa.

translation.en: I think he's upstairs studying with Paige.
translation.es: Creo que está estudiando arriba con Paige.

translation.en: I'm gonna read you this. It's called In Flames.
translation.es: Te voy a leer esto. Lo titulé En llamas.

translation.en: Very vulnerable piece. Looking across a campfire,
translation.es: Es algo muy personal. Al mirar sobre la fogata....

translation.en: I need a room with darkness.
You gonna float through the air and do a little Ooh?
translation.es: ¿Vas a flotar por el aire y harás uh?

translation.en: And you never will be with that attitude, Casper.
translation.es: Ni lo serás con esa actitud, Gasparín.

translation.en: What are the chances those bedsheets are crusty?
translation.es: A que las sábanas están tiesas.

translation.en: Probably snap like a taco shell.
- Can you give me a little space, please? - Oh, yeah. Sorry.

translation.es: Tal vez una segunda licenciatura en escritura.

translation.en: But I'm also crazy good at finance, so I don't want to waste that gift.
translation.es: Pero soy buenísimo en finanzas y... no quiero desperdiciar ese don.

translation.en: How long do you have to keep that on?
Seriously. Guys, who's messing with me?
- Chris. Hey. I didn't mean it like that... - Don't.
I just wanted to see if you're okay.
translation.es: Solo quería ver si estabas bien.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I didn't know anyone could get hurt in the real world.
translation.es: Perdón. No sabía que pudieran hacerte daño en el mundo real.

translation.en: You have no idea what you're messing with.
translation.es: No tienes idea de con qué te metes.

translation.en: I can't be a part of this, Dalton.
translation.es: No puedo ser parte de esto, Dalton.

translation.en: And neither should you. Because next time, you might not wake up.
translation.es: Y tú tampoco, o a la otra, puede que no despiertes.

translation.en: Uh, it's not your weekend. Kali's at a sleepover and Foster's...
translation.es: No es tu fin de semana, Kali no está...

translation.en: I'm not here for the kids.
translation.es: - y Foster... - No vengo por los niños.

translation.en: Wow, two calls in one week.
- Come on, man. - Haven't you made any friends yet?
translation.es: - No te burles. - ¿Aún no tienes amigos?

translation.en: Tell me everything you remember about my coma.
translation.es: Dime todo lo que recuerdes de cuando estuve en coma.

translation.en: - things I'm drawing, they... - The door?
And now a guy with a hammer.
translation.es: Y ahora, un tipo con un martillo.

translation.en: - A hammer? - I think they could be clues from my past,
translation.es: ¿Un martillo? Creo que pueden ser... cosas de mi pasado...

translation.en: thoughts that have disappeared 'cause of my coma.
translation.es: que desaparecieron por el coma. No sé por qué...

translation.en: - I don't know why they're coming out now-- - Wait. Dalton.
I've had this image in my mind for years.
translation.es: Tuve una imagen en la mente por años.

translation.en: Mom always says it's not real. It's just a bad dream. But...
translation.es: Mamá siempre dijo que no era real. Que era una pesadilla. Pero...

translation.en: Tell me, little brother. Come on.
Okay. We're in a room somewhere. Like a basement.
translation.es: Está bien. Estamos en un cuarto. Como un sótano.

translation.en: All I ever wanted was to be better than my father.
translation.es: Yo siempre quise ser mejor que mi padre.

translation.en: You know that. Just to be a good dad.
translation.es: Tú lo sabes. Ser un buen padre.
Y lo fuiste. Lo eres, Josh.

translation.en: Well, if it's any consolation, I can't even get him to call me back.
translation.es: Si te sirve de consuelo, a mí tampoco me llama.

translation.en: My dad abandoned his family, and...
translation.es: Mi padre abandonó a su familia y...

translation.en: You're not him, Josh, and you're allowed to be angry at him.
translation.es: No eres como él, Josh, y tienes derecho de enojarte con él.

translation.en: I am angry. I've been angry for a long time.
translation.es: Y estoy enojado desde hace mucho.

translation.en: Angry at a man that I have never met.
translation.es: Con un hombre al que nunca conocí.

translation.en: Angry at a man that jumped off the roof of a mental hospital in 1978.
translation.es: Con alguien que saltó de la azotea de un psiquiátrico en 1978.

translation.en: For more than 40 years, that man has been dead and gone.
translation.es: Ese hombre lleva más de 40 años muerto.

translation.en: So, how in the hell is he terrorizing me here, now, in the real world?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿cómo me aterra aquí, ahora, en el mundo real?

translation.en: - He attacked me at Mom's... - He attacked you?
translation.es: - Me atacó en casa de mamá... - ¿Te atacó?

translation.en: Yeah. So, am I just crazy, or...?
left this for my mom the day he died.
translation.es: le dejó esto... a mi mamá cuando murió.

translation.en: - Josh... - Is that the answer? Am I just crazy?
Is his madness inside of me?
Is that why I've been so lost the past few years?
translation.es: ¿Por eso me he sentido perdido los últimos años?

translation.en: Did I pass this curse on to our kids? Is he gonna haunt them...
translation.es: ¿Le heredé esto a los niños? ¿Los acosará como a mí?

translation.en: - Josh. - ...like he haunted me? Why didn't my mother say anything about this?
translation.es: - Josh, Josh... - ¿Por qué no dijo nada...

translation.en: So, Dalton and I could travel to some other...
translation.es: O sea que Dalton y yo viajábamos a otra...

translation.en: where we were haunted by ghosts and goblins.
translation.es: donde nos perseguían fantasmas y duendes.

translation.en: like the one in those photos that haunted you.
translation.es: como el de las fotos que te aterraban.

translation.en: And your father, he saw them too, and...
translation.es: Tu padre también los veía y...

translation.en: Back then, he told your mom. She didn't understand.
translation.es: Él se lo dijo a tu mamá. Ella no lo entendió.

translation.en: - She didn't know how to help him. - Help him like you helped us?
translation.es: - No supo ayudarlo. - ¿Así como tú a nosotros?

translation.en: We all thought it was for the best, Josh. You included.
translation.es: Todos pensamos que era lo mejor. Incluyéndote.

translation.en: The suppression, it slowed you down.
translation.es: La hipnosis te hizo sentir lento.

translation.en: And your mom and I, we didn't know what to do.
And I was too scared to tell you the truth.
translation.es: Y me daba miedo decirte la verdad.

translation.en: He said my mom had secrets, that she was hiding something from us.
translation.es: Dijo que mi mamá tenía secretos, que nos escondía cosas.

translation.en: I just never thought you did too.
translation.es: Pero no pensé que tú también.

translation.en: - For ten years... - You have no idea...
translation.es: - Me lo ocultaste diez años. - No tienes idea de lo difícil que fue.

translation.en: - ...you have kept this away from me. - ...how hard it has been for me.
translation.es: - Me lo ocultaste diez años. - No tienes idea de lo difícil que fue. - ¿Por qué? - No sabes.

translation.en: Because you tried to kill our family.
You chased us around the house with a goddamn baseball bat!
translation.es: ¡Nos perseguiste por la casa con un maldito bate!

translation.en: that it wasn't you. I knew it was that...
translation.es: que no eras tú. Sabía que era...

translation.en: thing in those photos, but the kids? They don't understand.
translation.es: la cosa de las fotos. Pero los niños no lo entendían.

translation.en: All those night terrors that Foster had.
translation.es: Todas las pesadillas que tuvo Foster.

translation.en: I've been lying to our children for a decade,
translation.es: Llevo una década diciéndoles a nuestros hijos...

translation.en: telling them those memories aren't real.
translation.es: que esos recuerdos no son reales.

translation.en: They're just your imagination. Dad's not gonna hurt you.
translation.es: Solo es tu imaginación. Papá no te va a lastimar.

translation.en: Doesn't matter to them what was controlling you.
translation.es: A ellos no les importa qué te controlaba.

translation.en: What they saw was your face. It was you who was causing all that pain.
translation.es: Veían tu cara. Tú les causabas ese dolor.

translation.en: That's why I pulled away. I just...
translation.es: Por eso me alejé. Ya no...

translation.en: I couldn't live like that anymore.
we could've gotten through this together.
Dalton just sent this to me.
translation.es: Dalton me la acaba de enviar.

translation.en: He's been having nightmares and visions.
- It's gonna be okay. - I don't know.
translation.es: Todo va a estar bien. - Va a estar bien. - No sé...

translation.en: It's okay. Nothing's gonna happen to us. I promise you, okay?
translation.es: No nos va a pasar nada. Te lo prometo, ¿sí?

translation.en: Take care of your brother, Dalton.
But why is Daddy mad at us?
translation.es: ¿Por qué se enojó papá con nosotros?

translation.en: I can go into the dark place and find Daddy.
translation.es: Puedo ir a la oscuridad por papá.

translation.en: - No, it's too dangerous. - I can do it, though.
translation.es: - No, es peligroso. - Pero sí puedo.

translation.en: No! Stop! What are you doing?
I'd like to dedicate this song to all of you out there.
translation.es: me gustaría dedicarles esta canción a todos ustedes.

translation.en: Sitting on the floor, being weird. That's normal.
translation.es: Estás de raro en el piso. Normal.

translation.en: Because I thought that when the power went out,
translation.es: Entonces, estás bien, ¿no? Porque... cuando se fue la luz, pensé que era ese reino oscuro.

translation.en: that you were messing with that dark realm shit again.
translation.es: cuando se fue la luz, pensé que era ese reino oscuro.

translation.en: And I know that you don't really care for the dark. So, I figured...
translation.es: Y como no te gusta la oscuridad, se me ocurrió...

translation.en: much like how I illuminate your life.
I'm not afraid of the dark anymore.
translation.es: Ya no me da miedo la oscuridad.

translation.en: Well, I hauled these all the way down here,
Even though you're totally freaking annoying. Jeez.
I got your text and I wrote a snarky response.
translation.es: Leí tu mensaje y escribí una respuesta burlona.

translation.en: because Grandma Perkee always told me to never escalate an argument over text.
translation.es: porque la abuela Perkee dice que no empeore un pleito por texto.

translation.en: But, I mean, if you want my opinion...
Don't go digging around in your past.
Some things are just better left buried, you know?
translation.es: Hay cosas que deben quedarse enterradas.

translation.en: sometimes you just have to move on.
translation.es: a veces hay que seguir adelante.

translation.en: I'm gonna get you out of this place, Dalton.
translation.es: Te voy a sacar de aquí, Dalton.

translation.en: We're gonna get out of here and we're gonna get home, okay?
translation.es: Nos iremos de aquí e iremos a casa, ¿sí?

translation.en: Dalton, tell me you're in there.
Dalton, I know you're in there.
But if you touch me again, I'm gonna fuck you up.
translation.es: Pero si me vuelves a tocar, te voy a joder.

translation.en: - It wasn't me. - I saw you!
Dalton, these things, they can possess our bodies.
translation.es: Estas cosas pueden poseer nuestro cuerpo.

translation.en: It happened to me, and now he's done it to you.
translation.es: Me pasó a mí, y ahora te lo hizo a ti.

translation.en: - No! - We can't hold it back, Dad.
We got to find something to block it. Something to seal it.
translation.es: Busquemos con qué trancarla. Algo para sellarla.

translation.en: You need to get rid of that thing. Burn it, forget about it.
translation.es: Deshazte de esa cosa. Quémala, olvídala.

translation.en: No, no, forgetting it doesn't work. We need to remember.
translation.es: No, olvidar no funciona. Tenemos que recordar.
Ya pasó. Ya pasó. Ya pasó.

translation.en: Yes. Yes, he's back. He's okay.
Tell Foster to pack his history homework. I'll help him with it.
translation.es: Dile a Foster que lleve su tarea de historia, le ayudaré.

translation.en: Could come a little earlier if you want. Join us for dinner.
translation.es: Si quieres, llega antes. Cena con nosotros.

translation.en: - Do you live here? - I hope so.
Guess I'm just lost in memories.
There's so much I want to tell her.

translation.es: Y se lo dirás. Algún día.

translation.en: You have a bright future ahead.
